ApplicationArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Identity Center application associated with the AWS Glue configuration.

AccountId.description: The identifier for the specified AWS account.

description: Creates a new AWS Glue Identity Center configuration to enable integration between AWS Glue and AWS IAM Identity Center for authentication and authorization.

InstanceArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Identity Center instance associated with the AWS Glue configuration.

Scopes.description: A list of Identity Center scopes that define the permissions and access levels for the AWS Glue configuration.

UserBackgroundSessionsEnabled.description: Indicates whether users can run background sessions when using Identity Center authentication with AWS Glue services.
